name: Skill Mastery (Investigator)
prereq: Investigator Dedication; Trained In At Least One Skill And Expert In At Least One Skill
summary: Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from expert to master and in another of your skills from trained to expert.
description:
Increase your proficiency rank in one of your skills from expert to master and in another of your skills from trained to expert. You gain a skill feat associated with one of the skills you chose.

Special You can select this feat up to five times.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
